title: The Seasons of Beento Blackbird
description: From Simon & Schuster, The Seasons of Beento Blackbird is Akosua Busia's novel about love and heritage, perfect for any lover of fiction.His father's death changes the life of writer Solomon Wilberforce, a best-selling novelist whose search for love and heritage sends him across Africa, America, and the Caribbean and into the arms of three different women.
author: Akosua Busia
